meta.title: Our Projects
meta.description: Over the years CSSSR has completed more than 500 projects. We've picked the most interesting of them to showcase.

hero.heading: Our projects
hero.text: We constantly challenge ourselves to solve problems. Here are some of our biggest projects.

gazprom.heading: Gazprom. Platform for business projects implementation
gazprom.text: The main goal of this project is to connect major corporations with talented performers. CSSSR was in charge of developing the front-end, including the main page, performer, and company dashboards, as well as the projects page.

s7.heading: S7 Airlines. Personal customer account
s7.text: We developed the entire front-end for the adaptive website of this project.

qacademy.heading: QAcademy. Interactive educational system
qacademy.text: We were entrusted with the front-end development of the authorization page, user profile, interactive training block, and certificate issuance page. Upon the development completion, our team integrated the developed pages with the customer’s API.

brusnika.heading: Brusnika. Internal assessment and forecasting tools
brusnika.text: We were engaged in the development of an internal sales planning tool for development company managers. This case will be remembered for complex logic and almost complete lack of HTML coding.

mindbox.heading: Mindbox. Platform for marketing automation
mindbox.text: We worked on two projects: development of a personal account data filtering system and a «Promotion Campaigns Arbitration» application development. Both required development of a complex logic cooperating with a tree structure.

flant.heading: Flant. Website of DevOps company
flant.text: Our team was engaged in Flant landing pages elaborating. We developed and tested 7 pages, adapted them for viewing on any device, including Retina, and adjusted the customer’s CRM application form.

mosoblgaz.heading: Mosoblgaz. Personal Account
mosoblgaz.text: We have developed a personal account for legal entities, which supports role models and restrictions for individual employees.

lms.heading: Modular Learning Management System
lms.text: Our LMS helps to start E-learning business. We offer design and development teams to do all the necessary integrations and personalization. The system is designed to support pedagogical models and help you to streamline your training.

timeTracker.heading: Time-tracking Software
timeTracker.text: A simple but powerful tool for time tracking and reporting. Helps increase work transparency and budgeting.
